name: Truck Racer (itch)
description:
Hello Gamer's, 

My Name is Mihir K. 

And This is my First game I made I hope Gamers You Enjoyed After Playing This Game. I am Working 2nd and 3td Stage of This game 2nd And 3td Stage Will be Added Very Soon So Please Support me So I Made A New Games After Completing This game Then I am Making Adult Games. 

So Please Support me I need your Support Gamer's. 

Special Thanks To My Friends For Given Me Ideas to Make this 2d Game 

Aman R. 

Fahim S. 

Vihan M. 

How To Play -

Right Key To Go Forward

Left Key To Go Backward

Up Key To Jump

Space Key To Break/Stop
